anthropometrics.comment: Measure your shoulder width in inches (across the top of shoulders)

joints.comment: Joint indices from your pose data (usually don't need to change)

instructions.step1: Measure your shoulder width in inches and update 'shoulder_width_in'
instructions.step2: Set your ROM limits - the min/max angles you can achieve for each movement
instructions.step3: Set neutral positions - your comfortable baseline (usually 0-5 degrees)
instructions.step4: Run: python test_shoulder_mapper.py to test your settings
instructions.step5: Adjust values if DOF ranges don't look right (should be 0-1 range)
